channel.title: A reapers best friend
channel.description:
I thought of his
Reaper:hey scorned no luck on getting your target lynched
Scorned: no all of them are "confirmed"
Reaper:Here the deal.we team up. I chill one of your targets. We get them On the stand. You trollbox them to contradict themselves. Lynched
Scorned: okay
Target gets lynched
Reaper: now I chill another person and can you trollbox them
Scorned: yea
Targets gets lynched. They were the prince
Ez
